DeleteAccount.Title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.Subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

About.FirstParagraph: All of your assets and data associated with your account will be permanently deleted.
About.SecondParagraph: Unfortunately, this action is irreversible and cannot be reversed.
About.ThirdParagraph: However, you will have 30 days to re-login to cancel your account deletion request. After 30 days, your account will be permanently deleted.
About.FourthParagraph: Please select a reason from the dropdown menu below:

Reason.First: I don’t feel safe on Beamco
Reason.Fourth: I spend too much time using Beamco
Reason.Five: I don’t understand how to use Beamco

TopupInfo.Title: Credit Purchase
TopupInfo.SubtitleIos: If a course purchased through the iOS app isn’t in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction in Apple; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the course isn't added, send us your Apple receipt to help resolve the issue.
TopupInfo.SubtitleAndroid: If a course purchased through the Android app isn’t in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction in Google Play; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the course isn't added, send us your Google Play receipt to help resolve the issue.
